question: Who was the first player in Atlanta Braves history to win the National League MVP award, and in what year did he achieve this feat?
answer: Hank Aaron won the National League MVP award in 1957, becoming the first player in Atlanta Braves history to do so.
raw_content:
Question: Who was the first player in Atlanta Braves history to win the National League MVP award, and in what year did he achieve this feat?  
Answer: Hank Aaron won the National League MVP award in 1957, becoming the first player in Atlanta Braves history to do so.
